title: Fourth-Generation AI Law Schema
description: Defines the structure for a single, canonical law in the Robotics & AI Laws framework.

id.description: The unique, zero-indexed identifier for the law.

title.description: The full, canonical title of the law (e.g., 'The Primordial Ethic').

principle.description: The complete, normative statement of the law.

annotations.description: An array of notes that clarify the scope, intent, and application of the law.
